title: Fireside with the Underboss: Carlo Gambino's Nephew Gored By The Bull
description: Matty Gambino, Carlo Gambino's nephew, goes toe to toe with Sammy and gets put right in his place. But what does this mean for Sammy as an acting member of the Gambino family?
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Matty Gambino, Carlo Gambino's nephew, goes toe to toe with Sammy and gets put right in his place. But what does this mean for Sammy as an acting member of the Gambino family?
itunes:summary: Matty Gambino, Carlo Gambino's nephew, goes toe to toe with Sammy and gets put right in his place. But what does this mean for Sammy as an acting member of the Gambino family?
